means: （使）高兴起来，吱吱叫，喋喋而言

sentence.Network_en: He looked unusually chipper this morning.
sentence.Network_cn: 今早他看上去格外高兴。

sentence.Network_en: What tree chipper he fed her four - year - old body into?
sentence.Network_cn: 他用什么切割机把她四 岁 的尸体肢解了?

sentence.Network_en: The workers were feeding branches into the wood chipper.
sentence.Network_cn: 工人们正把树枝放进这个木头切片机.

PerfectNetExp.abs: § 切片机 (Chippers)／粉碎机 (Shredders)原料：处理原木、树枝，以及直径超过 2.5 公分的材料。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: perhaps from northern English dialect kipper 'lively'

entry.tran: 兴高采烈的;活泼的;活跃的

example.ex: He looked unusually chipper this morning.
example.tran: 今早他看上去格外高兴。

means.word_mean: 1. having a cheerful, lively, and self-confident air;

sentences.sentence: "looking chipper, like a man...diverted by his own wit"- Frances G. Patton
"life that is gay, brisk, and debonair"- H.M.Reynolds

example.en: A glass of wine will make her chipper almost immedi-ately.
example.zh: 只要一杯酒几乎马上就能把她灌醉。

list.explanation: 愉快活泼的，气色好的，精力旺盛的，生气勃勃的

example.en: Well. you look chipper this morning!
example.zh: 唷，今天早上你看上去气色不错啊!

example.en: This chipper young man will show you around.
example.zh: 这位活泼的年轻人将会带你去参观的。

auth_sentence.content: Yet the four women standing here on rickety soapboxes look surprisingly chipper.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet the four women standing here on rickety soapboxes look surprisingly chipper.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet the four women standing here on rickety soapboxes look surprisingly chipper.

auth_sentence.content: Even without retired third baseman Chipper Jones, the Braves are stocked once again.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even without retired third baseman Chipper Jones, the Braves are stocked once again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even without retired third baseman Chipper Jones, the Braves are stocked once again.

sentences.en: what are you so chipper about?
sentences.cn: 看你们满面春风，发生什么了？
